# Clipping data

**API Collection**

Clip the pixel values of an image.

## Clipping data

- **vImageClip_PlanarF(_:_:_:_:_:)**: Clips the values in a floating-point 32-bit planar buffer to the specified minimum and maximum values.

items.description: Clips the values in a floating-point 32-bit planar buffer to the specified minimum and maximum values.
items.name: vImageClip_PlanarF(_:_:_:_:_:)
